title: Chocolate Cupcakes with Nutella Icing
ingredients: ['180g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '160ml buttermilk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '130g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '50g cocoa powder', '1 large pinch of salt', '160g butter, melted', '2 tablespoons whipping cream', '130g dark chocolate, cut into small dices', 'To decorate', '12 teaspoons Nutella (chocolate hazelnut spread)', '60 mini eggs or coloured sprinkles (optional)']
